description: Number of 3 X 3 matrices, with elements from {0,...,n}, having the property that the middle element of each of the eight 3-element horizontal, vertical and diagonal lines equals the average of the two end elements.
comments: The bisections of the first differences of {a(n)} give A001844 (the centered triangular numbers n^2+(n-1)^2).Quasipolynomial of order 2. [_Charles R Greathouse IV_, Dec 07 2011]
